casebody.data:
John H. ARMSTRONG, Secretary, Florida Department of Health, et al., applicants,
v.
James D. BRENNER, et al. No. 14-650. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 19, 2014.

Opinion

Application for stay presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied.

Justice SCALIAand Justice THOMASwould grant the application for stay.
